title: Dark Star Aatrox. or Nightbringer Aatrox.
body:
Riot please make this happen. Dark star skin line suits darkins so much.
Every other darkin has dark star skin (Varus, rhaast) so please. 
also aatrox doesnt have single legendary skin with different voice lines, etc.
and hes been very popular lately so it will be good for you guys and aatrox players too

replies.body: Where is Kayns Dark Star Skin at? oO

> [{quoted}](name=Dark Ruger,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=37wuQe0g,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-05-15T04:09:52.691+0000)
>
> Odyssey

That is an Odyssey Skin, not a Dark Star Skin.

Except it's much more than that. You see..

The default Kayn in-game is the Odyssey Kayn skin, but the name of the skin changes depending which form you choose. 

If you pick the Shadow Assassin form you get Cosmic Emperor Shadow Assassin and if you pick Rhaast you get Dark Star Rhaast.
But it is. It's even in the voice over where he speaks of being a dark star. It features both dark star and cosmic skin line themes.

> [{quoted}](name=Laufplanke,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=37wuQe0g,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-05-15T04:16:38.830+0000)
>
> That is an Odyssey Skin, not a Dark Star Skin.

It's literally Dark Star Rhaast. It's a crossover skin.
Dark star would be pretty cool, though I personally don't think It'd need to be legendary as it wouldn't really change his perona heavily.
you know what would be cool ultraman or the guyver themed skins

Ahh. I can actually imagine how sick it could be... Looking at already some of the Dark Star's Login Composed Music it has so much potential.

Nightbringer isn't really that special tbh, because you're just evil and that's it (atleast what i'm getting from the Nightbringer Yasuo Skin).

I think Aatrox's Dark Star Skin should be a legendary one assuming he is going to get it at all.
